titleStmt.title: The husbandlye ordring and gouernmente of poultrie Practised by the learnedste, and suche as haue bene knowne skilfullest in that arte, and in our tyme.
titleStmt.author: Mascall, Leonard, d. 1589.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Thomas Purfoote, for Gerarde Dewse,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The nourishing and gouernmente of poultrie.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
